mapper.select: SELECT C.NO , TO_CHAR(C.ARRIVED, 'HH : MI AM') AS ARRIVED , TO_CHAR(C.LEAVE, 'HH : MI PM') AS LEAVE , TO_CHAR(C.WORK_DATE, 'YYYY - MM - DD') AS WORK_DATE , E.NAME AS EMP_NO FROM COMMUTE C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_NO = E.NO WHERE C.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY C.WORK_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUTE(NO, EMP_NO, ARRIVED) VALUES(SEQ_COMMUTE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUTE SET LEAVE = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND NO = (SELECT MAX(NO) FROM COMMUTE)
